description:
Template:HideFromAnonymous Eden Canyon route is below the highway - the "descent" track is off. The portion above the highway is considered not worth doing. Great but short canyon. Gnarly vertical exit hike or leave ropes and ascend out.

Approach

Descent

Do not pull the ropes on the final two rappels until you have verified the exit. You may need to ascend.

Exit

Normal exit is canyon right after the last drop on a fixed line. If the line is gone or not usable you may need to ascend up two drops.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Eden (Puohokamoa Stream)
